name: RoboBall 5000
description:
Title:  RoboBall 5000

Platform: PC

 Game Genre: Platformer

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers

Game Overview: Brief description of the game, about a paragraph or two.

Instructions: Use the right arrow key to accelerate and space bar to jump to keep your character alive and moving throughout the level and remember don't hit the top of the spikes.

Game Design Team: Chase Kronfeld - Game Designer
